dialogue: The great thing about this country is that we have freedom of speech!
Is it okay to say that?
Hmm... let's see if it's on the free speech checklist...
Okay, you didn't advocate overthrowing the government...
You did not generalize about a disadvantaged group.
You did not teach children anything useful or practical...
You didn't refer to anybody who can afford a lawyer to sue us...
And there's nobody within hearing distance who can harm us financially...
